cards.name: Owl
cards.cardText:
WELL SPOTTED During your turn, whenever a card is put into your inkwell, chosen opposing character gets -1 {S} until the start of your next turn.

"I say, land who! Er, ho—land ho!"

cards.name: Lilo
cards.cardText:
NO PLACE I’D RATHER BE At the start of your turn, if this card is in your discard, you may play her and she enters play exerted.

"You can't keep me away from the fun!"

cards.name: Winnie the Pooh
cards.cardText:
Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {S} to another chosen character's {S} this turn.)

WE'RE PIRATES, YOU SEE Whenever this character quests, you pay 1 {I} less for the next Pirate character you play this turn.

cards.name: Gopher
cards.cardText: "I keep fixin' this same ding-danged hole! I should start charging overtime, plus 10 percent."

cards.name: Simba
cards.cardText: "Look at that water, and those birds! Wow. Wait 'til Timon and Pumbaa see this!"

cards.name: Chip
cards.cardText:
DALE'S PARTNER When you play this character, chosen character gets +1 {L} this turn.

"Come on, Dale—this is no time for hanging around!"

cards.name: Dale
cards.cardText:
CHIP'S PARTNER This character enters play exerted unless you have a character named Chip in play.

"But Chip, hanging around is what I do best!"

cards.name: David
cards.cardText:
SHOWING OFF While you have a character named Nani in play, this character gets +2 {L}.

"Grab a board and come on out! Choice waves today."

cards.name: Prince Naveen
cards.cardText:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Prince Naveen.)
Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

cards.name: Prince Naveen
cards.cardText: "Dance little friends—fill the air with light and joy. Achidanza! It is like seeing music come to life."

cards.name: Chief Bogo
cards.cardText: YOU LIKE GAZELLE TOO? While you have a character named Gazelle in play, this character gains Singer 6. (He counts as cost 6 to sing songs.)

cards.name: Chip
cards.cardText: THE VALUE OF FRIENDSHIP While you have a character named Dale in play, this character gains Support. (Whenever they quest, you may add their {S} to another chosen character's {S} this turn.)

cards.name: Monterey Jack
cards.cardText: "There's only one thing I like more than cheese—nothin'."

cards.name: Chip 'n' Dale
cards.cardText:
Shift 5 (You may pay 5 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Chip or Dale.)
(This character counts as being named both Chip and Dale.)
SEARCH AND RESCUE During your turn, whenever a card is put into your inkwell, you may return a character card from your discard to your hand.

cards.name: Judy Hopps
cards.cardText:
Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {S} to another chosen character's {S} this turn.)

NEED SOME HELP? At the end of your turn, you may ready another chosen character of yours.

cards.name: Tiana
cards.cardText:
SPECIAL RESERVATION Whenever a character of yours is challenged while this character is exerted, the challenging character gets -3 {S} this turn unless their player pays 3 {I}.

"The only way to get what you want in this world is through hard work."

cards.name: Grand Councilwoman
cards.cardText:
FIND IT! Whenever this character quests, your other Alien characters get +1 {L} this turn.

"I want an expert on this planet in here now!"

cards.name: Dale
cards.cardText: NUTS ABOUT PRANKS When you play this character, you may put the top 3 cards of your deck into your discard to give chosen character -3 {S} until the start of your next turn.

cards.name: Nani
cards.cardText:
Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {S} to another chosen character’s {S} this turn.)
I AM SO SORRY 2 {I} - Chosen character gets -1 {S} until the start of your next turn.

cards.name: Simba
cards.cardText:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Simba.)
UNDERSTAND THE BALANCE At the end of your turn, if this character is exerted, you may ready your other characters.

cards.name: Kanga
cards.cardText:
SAFE AND SOUND Whenever this character quests, choose a character of yours and that character can't be challenged until the start of your next turn.

"My, you've had an awfully big adventure. Now it's time to rest."

cards.name: Rabbit
cards.cardText:
BE MORE CAREFUL When you play this character, you may remove up to 1 damage from chosen character.

"See? I told you it was dangerous out there!"

cards.name: Roo
cards.cardText:
I'M A PIRATE TOO! When you play this character, you may give chosen character -2 {S} until the start of your next turn.

"Look at all my ships, mama! We're going on the Azurite Sea!"

cards.name: Mr. Litwak
cards.cardText:
THE GANG'S ALL HERE Once during your turn, whenever you play another character, you may ready this character. He can’t quest or challenge for the rest of this turn.

"Come on in. Good to see you."

cards.name: Jim Hawkins
cards.cardText:
Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)
HIRE A CREW When you play this character, look at the top 4 cards of your deck. You may reveal any number of Pirate character cards and put them into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

cards.name: Stitch
cards.cardText:
NEED A HAND? 1 {I} - This character gets +1 {S} this turn.

Always ready in an emergency—usually because he caused it.

cards.name: Good Job!
cards.cardText:
Chosen character gets +1 {L} this turn.

"Be proud of that badge. You earned it."
—Judy Hopps

cards.name: I Won't Give In
cards.cardText:
(A character with cost 2 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Return a character card with cost 2 or less from your discard to your hand.

'Til I reach the end, and then I'll start again

cards.name: Rescue Rangers Away!
cards.cardText: Count the number of characters you have in play. Chosen character loses {S} equal to that number until the start of your next turn.

cards.name: Safe and Sound
cards.cardText:
Chosen character of yours can’t be challenged until the start of your next turn.

"Here I am, mama!"

cards.name: Naveen's Ukulele
cards.cardText:
MAKE IT SING 1 {I}, Banish this item - Chosen character counts as having +3 cost to sing songs this turn.

"I love this instrument! I strum, everyone dances."
—Prince Naveen

cards.name: Pooh Pirate Ship
cards.cardText:
MAKE A RESCUE {E}, 3 {I} – Return a Pirate character card from your discard to your hand.

The friendliest ship on the Azurite Sea.

cards.name: Scrump
cards.cardText:
I MADE HER {E} one of your characters - Chosen character gets -2 {S} until the start of your next turn.

"Her head is too big. So I pretend a bug laid eggs in her ears..."
—Lilo

cards.name: Hundred Acre Island
cards.cardText: FRIENDS FOREVER During an opponent's turn, whenever a character is banished here, gain 1 lore.

cards.name: Sugar Rush Speedway
cards.cardText: BRING IT HOME, LITTLE ONE! When you move a character here from another location, you may banish this location to gain 3 lore and draw 3 cards.

cards.name: Hades
cards.cardText:
SOUL COLLECTOR Whenever one of your other characters is banished during the opponent's turn, gain 2 lore.

"You could say I'm big on the catch, not so much on the release."

cards.name: Madam Mim
cards.cardText:
Challenger +1 (While challenging, this character gets +1 {S}.)
ZIM ZABBERIM ZIM Your other characters gain Challenger +1.

cards.name: Genie
cards.cardText: "For the indecisive sailor we have three, count 'em, three ships in one! It sails, it flies, it juliennes fries! All for the low price of just one wish."

cards.name: Sisu
cards.cardText:
Challenger +2 (While challenging, this character gets +2 {S}).

"I'm a water dragon. This is water. It's sort of my thing."

cards.name: The White Rose
cards.cardText:
THE BEAUTY OF THE WORLD When you play this character, gain 1 lore.

"You can learn a lot of things from the flowers..."
—Alice

cards.name: Juju
cards.cardText:
BEES' KNEES When you play this character, move 1 damage counter from chosen character to chosen opposing character.

"Juju! You get yourself out of that there magic, you bad boy!"
—Mama Odie

cards.name: Rafiki
cards.cardText: "The signs, they never lie. The snake thinks he's planned for everything... Oh, ho, ho! He forgot about the owl. There's hope yet!"

cards.name: Tinker Bell
cards.cardText:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

She zips through the waves without a drop of water touching her.

cards.name: The Carpenter
cards.cardText:
I'LL GET YOU! When this character is banished, you may exert chosen character.

The Carpenter's stomach growled as he clenched his hammer tight...

cards.name: Iago
cards.cardText:
GUESS WHO When this character is banished in a challenge, return this card to your hand.

"You think you can get rid of me that easy?!"

cards.name: The Walrus
cards.cardText: ... While the Walrus finished off the lot, down to the final bite.

cards.name: Scar
cards.cardText:
Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)
Challenger +3 (While challenging, this character gets +3 {S}.)

cards.name: Tinker Bell
cards.cardText:
Shift 5 (You may pay 5 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Tinker Bell.)
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
SHINING EXAMPLE Whenever this character quests, your other Fairy characters get +1 {L} this turn.

cards.name: Diablo
cards.cardText:
FLY, MY PET! When this character is banished, you may draw a card.

"Go, and do not fail me."
—Maleficent

cards.name: March Hare
cards.cardText:
Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)

"Clear the table? Don't mind if I do!"

cards.name: Magic Carpet
cards.cardText:
"Carpet's always come through for us before! He won't let us down now." 
—Jasmine

cards.name: Rafiki
cards.cardText:
Shift 7 (You may pay 7 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Rafiki.)
ASTRAL ATTUNEMENT During your turn, whenever a card is put into your inkwell, you may draw a card.

cards.name: Genie
cards.cardText:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
WHAT HAPPENS NOW? When you play this character, draw a card.

"Oh, does that feel good!"

cards.name: Sisu
cards.cardText: TRUST BUILDS TRUST Whenever this character quests, reveal the top card of your deck. If it’s a Dragon character card, put it into your hand and repeat this effect. Otherwise, put it on either the top or the bottom of your deck.

cards.name: Madam Mim
cards.cardText:
OH, BAT GIZZARDS 2 {I}, Choose and discard a card - Gain 1 lore.

"I'll give you a sporting chance. I'm mad about games, you know."

cards.name: Yzma
cards.cardText:
FEEL THE POWER {E} - If you have fewer than 3 cards in your hand, draw until you have 3 cards in your hand.

"One of these has got to work. Let's see what happens."

cards.name: Mama Odie
cards.cardText: I HAVE TO DO EVERYTHING AROUND HERE Whenever you play a song, you may move up to 2 damage counters from chosen character to chosen opposing character.

cards.name: Peter Pan
cards.cardText:
GOTCHA! During your turn, whenever a card is put into your inkwell, exert chosen opposing character.

"You're not getting away from me this time!"

cards.name: Mad Hatter
cards.cardText: WE'LL HAVE TO LOOK INTO THIS Whenever this character quests, you may look at the top card of chosen player's deck. Put it on top of their deck or into their discard.

cards.name: A Very Merry Unbirthday
cards.cardText:
(A character with cost 1 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Each opponent puts the top 2 cards of their deck into their discard.

Now blow the candle out, my dear
And make your wish come true

cards.name: Genie
cards.cardText:
Shift 5 (You may pay 5 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Genie.)
YOUR REWARD AWAITS Whenever you play a card, draw a card.
FORBIDDEN TREASURE At the end of your turn, put all the cards in your hand on the bottom of your deck in any order.

cards.name: Making Magic
cards.cardText:
Move 1 damage counter from chosen character to chosen opposing character. Draw a card.

"That's got some zang to it!"
—Mama Odie

cards.name: Lose the Way
cards.cardText:
Exert chosen character. Then, you may choose and discard a card. If you do, the exerted character can't ready at the start of their next turn.

"Well, when one's lost, I suppose it's good advice to stay where you are until someone finds you."
—Alice

cards.name: Seeking the Half Crown
cards.cardText:
For each Sorcerer character you have in play, you pay 1 {I} less to play this action.
Draw 2 cards.

"I see the other half, in the Inklands. Quick, my tiny companion! Fetch me that crown!"
—Jafar

cards.name: Maleficent's Staff
cards.cardText: BACK, FOOLS! Whenever one of your opponents' characters, items, or locations is returned to their hand from play, gain 1 lore.

cards.name: Mad Hatter's Teapot
cards.cardText:
NO ROOM, NO ROOM {E}, 1 {I} - Each opponent puts the top card of their deck into their discard.

Alice: "My goodness, the tea missed the cup!"
Mad Hatter: "No, no, my dear—the cup missed the tea!"

cards.name: Pixie Dust
cards.cardText: FAITH AND TRUST {E}, {2} {I} - Chosen character gains Challenger +2 and Evasive until the start of your next turn. (While challenging, they get +2 {1}. Only characters with Evasive can challenge them.)

cards.name: Fairy Ship
cards.cardText: Legends say that whenever something goes missing, it's been taken to build the fairy ships of the Azurite Sea.

cards.name: Mystical Tree
cards.cardText:
NOT BAD At the start of your turn, you may move 1 damage counter from chosen character here to chosen opposing character.

HARD-EARNED WISDOM At the start of your turn, if you have a character named Mama Odie here, gain 1 lore.

cards.name: Jasmine
cards.cardText:
BY ORDER OF THE PRINCESS When you play this character, choose one: 
* Exert chosen damaged character. 
* Chosen opposing character gains Reckless during their next turn. (They can't quest and must challenge if able.)

cards.name: Captain Hook
cards.cardText:
INSPIRES DREAD While this character is exerted, opposing Pirate characters can't quest.
UPPER HAND Whenever this character is challenged, draw a card.

cards.name: Stitch
cards.cardText:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Stitch.)
READY FOR ACTION When you play this character, if you used Shift to play him, you may put an action card from your discard on the top of your deck.

cards.name: Go Go Tomago
cards.cardText:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
STOP WHINING, WOMAN UP When you play this character, you may pay 2 {I} to gain lore equal to the damage on chosen opposing character.

cards.name: Honey Lemon
cards.cardText:
HERE'S THE BEST PART When you play this character, you may pay 2 {I} to have each opponent choose and discard a card.

"You're going to love this!"

cards.name: Fred
cards.cardText:
HOW COOL IS THAT Whenever this character is challenged, gain 2 lore.

"...but by night... I am also a school mascot."

cards.name: Tootles
cards.cardText: Every Lost Boy has a favorite hiding spot. Tootles has twelve.

cards.name: Dawson
cards.cardText: "By Jove, he must be around here somewhere. Basil! Basil! Shout if—aaahhh!"

cards.name: Heathcliff
cards.cardText:
Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)

Loyal butler, training target, helicopter pilot—and completely unflappable.

cards.name: Basil
cards.cardText:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

"Hmm. Footprints from a large... owl? With droplets of water? Clearly some avian menace has crossed the Azurite Sea and absconded with the crown!"

cards.name: Donald Duck
cards.cardText:
CAPTAIN ON DECK While you have a Captain character in play, this character gets +2 {L}.

"A promotion! It's about time someone recognized my natural leadership skills!"

cards.name: Daisy Duck
cards.cardText:
DISTANT SHORES Whenever one of your Pirate characters quests while at a location, draw a card.

"The answers we're looking for are on the other side of that maze, I just know it!"

cards.name: Mertle Edmonds
cards.cardText: "Get out of my way before I run you over."

cards.name: Prince Phillip
cards.cardText:
Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)

A clear head and a calm hand will see you through uncharted waters.

cards.name: Jasmine
cards.cardText:
Shift 5 (You may pay 5 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Jasmine.)
RULER OF THE SEAS When you play this character, if you used Shift to play her, return all other exerted characters to their players’ hands.

cards.name: Peter Pan
cards.cardText:
LOOK INNOCENT This character enters play exerted.
CAN'T TAKE A JOKE? While this character is exerted, each opposing player can't gain lore unless one of their characters has challenged this turn.

cards.name: Hercules
cards.cardText:
Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)
STRONG LIKE HIS DAD 3 {I} - Deal 1 damage to chosen damaged character.

cards.name: Alistair Krei
cards.cardText:
AN EYE FOR TECH When you play this character, if an opponent has an item in play, gain 1 lore.

"Sleek yet strong... These inkrunners are an extraordinary feat of engineering."

cards.name: Gazelle
cards.cardText: YOU ARE A REALLY HOT DANCER When you play this character, chosen character gains Evasive until the start of your next turn. (Only characters with Evasive can challenge them.)

cards.name: Goofy
cards.cardText:
Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)
CLEVER DESIGN Whenever this character quests, chosen character gains Ward until the start of your next turn.

cards.name: Bellwether
cards.cardText: FEAR ALWAYS WORKS During your turn, whenever a card is put into your inkwell, chosen opposing character gains Reckless during their next turn. (They can't quest and must challenge if able.)

cards.name: Basil
cards.cardText:
Shift 4 (You may pay 4 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Basil.)
TWISTS AND TURNS During your turn, whenever a card is put into your inkwell, you may pay 1 {I} to have chosen opponent choose and discard a card.

cards.name: Olivia Flaversham
cards.cardText: She had searched high and low in the Illuminary for any hint of Basil. Instead, she found something completely unexpected...

cards.name: Bend to My Will
cards.cardText:
Each opponent discards all cards in their hand.

"At last! This is where your luck runs out!"

cards.name: Prepare to Board!
cards.cardText:
Chosen character gets +2 {S} this turn. If a Pirate character is chosen, they get +3 {S} instead.

"Bring me the treasure, bring me that ship, and bring me Peter Pan!"
—Captain Hook

cards.name: Heffalumps and Woozles
cards.cardText:
(A character with cost 2 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Chosen opposing character can't quest during their next turn. Draw a card.

If honey's what you covet, you'll find that they love it

cards.name: Mosquito Bite
cards.cardText:
Put 1 damage counter on chosen character.

"Don't move. A mosquito has chosen me as her perch. She's so... beautiful."

cards.name: You Came Back
cards.cardText:
Ready chosen character.

"Nobody gets left behind."
—Stitch

cards.name: MegaBot
cards.cardText:
HAPPY FACE This item enters play exerted.
DESTROY! {E}, Banish this item - Choose one:
* Banish chosen item.
* Banish chosen damaged character.

cards.name: Galactic Communicator
cards.cardText:
RESOURCE ALLOCATION 1 {I}, Banish this item - Return chosen character with 2 {S} or less to their player's hand.

The best way to keep in touch with those you're looking for.

cards.name: Transport Pod
cards.cardText:
GIVE 'EM A SHOW At the start of your turn, you may move a character of yours to a location for free.

"We've reinvented the very concept of transportation."
—Alistair Krei

cards.name: Perilous Maze
cards.cardText: LOST IN THE WAVES Whenever a character is challenged while here, each opponent chooses and discards a card.

cards.name: Owl Island
cards.cardText:
TEAMWORK For each character you have here, you pay 1 {I} less for the first action you play each turn.
LOTS TO LEARN Whenever you play a second action in a turn, gain 3 lore.

cards.name: Mickey Mouse
cards.cardText:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Mickey Mouse.)
MARINER’S MIGHT Whenever this character quests, chosen Pirate character gets +2 {S} and gains "This character takes no damage from challenges" this turn.

cards.name: Kakamora
cards.cardText:
Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)

Moana: "Do you think they saw us?"
Maui: "They saw us."

cards.name: Kakamora
cards.cardText: DIZZYING SPEED When you play this character, chosen Pirate character gains Evasive until the start of your next turn. (Only characters with Evasive can challenge them.)

cards.name: Jasmine
cards.cardText:
YOU'LL NEVER MISS IT Whenever this character quests, each opponent loses 1 lore.

Even the smallest mouse can make the biggest difference.

cards.name: Raya
cards.cardText: COME ON, LET'S DO THIS Once during your turn, whenever a card is put into your inkwell, you may ready another chosen character of yours. They can't quest for the rest of this turn.

cards.name: Wendy Darling
cards.cardText:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
LOOK LIVELY, CREW! While you have another Pirate character in play, this character gets +1 {S} and +1 {L}.

cards.name: John Silver
cards.cardText: YOU HAVE TO CHART YOUR OWN COURSE Whenever this character quests, you may deal 1 damage to one of your other characters. If you do, ready that character. They cannot quest this turn.

cards.name: Vanellope Von Schweetz
cards.cardText:
AS READY AS I'LL EVER BE At the start of your turn, if this character is at a location, draw a card and gain 1 lore.

"Almost got it!"

cards.name: Michael Darling
cards.cardText: "Hoist the colors! Prepare to fight! Teddy bear at the ready!"

cards.name: Aladdin
cards.cardText: Finding your way through the Azurite Sea takes a stout heart, plenty of courage, and more than a little luck.

cards.name: Markowski
cards.cardText:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

"Just what we needed—a new place to fight bugs."

cards.name: Abu
cards.cardText:
Rush (This character can challenge the turn they’re played.)

"Port, Abu! Port! To the left! ABU! The other way!"
—Aladdin

cards.name: Mickey Mouse
cards.cardText:
SOLID GROUND While this character is at a location, he gets +2 {S}.

"Golly, this looked a lot easier from the ship. But I know I can make it—the crew is counting on me!"

cards.name: Adorabeezle Winterpop
cards.cardText:
KEEP DRIVING While this character has damage, she gets +1 {L}.

"It'll take more than that to knock me out of the race!"

cards.name: Moana
cards.cardText:
LEARNING THE ROPES This character can't challenge unless you have a Captain character in play.

"You wanna tell me I don't know what I'm doing? I know I don't!"

cards.name: John Darling
cards.cardText: "Get ready, Michael! Here they come!"

cards.name: Aladdin
cards.cardText:
Shift 2 (You may pay 2 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Aladdin.)
REMEMBER YOUR TRAINING When you play this character, your characters get +2 {S} this turn.

cards.name: Minnie Mouse
cards.cardText:
LAND, HO! Once during your turn, whenever a card is put into your inkwell, you may return a location card from your discard to your hand.

Minnie leaned forward. Could it be true? Was this the island at last?

cards.name: Moana
cards.cardText:
Shift 5 (You may pay 5 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Moana.)
GATHERING FORCES When you play this character, you may move any number of your characters to the same location for free. Gain 1 lore for each character you moved.

cards.name: Pete
cards.cardText: Pete was always looking for trouble. Now he was finally getting paid for it.

cards.name: Goofy
cards.cardText:
Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

"Hold on to yer hat!"

cards.name: Maui
cards.cardText:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
CHEEEEOHOOOO! Whenever this character challenges another character, you may return an action card from your discard to your hand.
WAYFINDING Whenever you play an action, gain 1 lore.

cards.name: Hades
cards.cardText:
WHAT ARE YOU GONNA DO? {E}, 3 {I}, Banish one of your characters – Banish chosen character.

"Panic, use your head for once!"

cards.name: Tigger
cards.cardText:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
SWASH YOUR BUCKLES Whenever you play an action, this character gets +1 {S} and +1 {L} this turn.

cards.name: Scar
cards.cardText:
BARED TEETH When you play this character, deal 2 damage to chosen character of yours to deal 2 damage to chosen character.

"It's for the greater good. I'm sure you understand."
—Scar

cards.name: Thievery
cards.cardText:
Chosen opponent loses 1 lore. Gain 1 lore.

Apples, gems, magic lamp ... Abu's not picky as long as there's something worth stealing.

cards.name: Lead the Way
cards.cardText:
Your characters get +2 {S} this turn.

"We have what it takes to find our way through this maze, together! Hold on—we're going in!"

cards.name: The Islands I Pulled from the Sea
cards.cardText:
(A character with cost 3 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Search your deck for a location card, reveal that card to all players, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

So what can I say except... you're welcome

cards.name: Energy Blast
cards.cardText:
Banish chosen character. Draw a card.

"Did you really think I would fight fair?"
—Jafar

cards.name: Longboat
cards.cardText: TAKE IT FOR A SPIN 2 {I} – Chosen character of yours gains Evasive until the start of your next turn. (Only characters with Evasive can challenge them.)

cards.name: Gold Coin
cards.cardText:
GLITTERING ACCESS {E}, 1 {I}, Banish this item – Ready chosen character of yours. They can't quest for the rest of this turn.

"Sweet mother of monkey milk! A gold coin!"
—Vanellope von Schweetz

cards.name: Card Soldier's Spear
cards.cardText: A SUITABLE WEAPON Your damaged characters get +1 {S}.

cards.name: Flotilla
cards.cardText: TINY THIEVES At the start of your turn, if you have a character here, all opponents lose 1 lore and you gain lore equal to the lore lost this way.

cards.name: Skull Rock
cards.cardText:
FAMILIAR GROUND Characters get +1 {S} while here.
SAFE HAVEN At the start of your turn, if you have a Pirate character here, gain 1 lore.

cards.name: B.E.N.
cards.cardText: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {S} to another chosen character's {S} this turn.)

cards.name: Aunt Cass
cards.cardText:
HAPPY TO HELP Whenever this character quests, chosen Inventor character gets +1 {L} this turn.

"All right, geniuses, let's feed those hungry brains."

cards.name: Gadget Hackwrench
cards.cardText:
BRAINSTORM Whenever you play an item, this character gets +1 {L} this turn.

"Golly, a perfect wingnut! There's about a million uses for that!"

cards.name: Gadget Hackwrench
cards.cardText:
Shift 4 (You may pay 4 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Gadget Hackwrench.)
MECHANICALLY SAVVY While you have 3 or more items in play, you pay 1 {I} less to play Inventor characters.

cards.name: Zipper
cards.cardText:
Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)
RUN INTERFERENCE During your turn, whenever a card is put into your inkwell, another chosen character gains Resist +1 until the start of your next turn. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)

cards.name: Oswald
cards.cardText: FAVORABLE CHANCE During your turn, whenever a card is put into your inkwell, you may reveal the top card of your deck. If it’s an item card, you may play that item for free and it enters play exerted. Otherwise, put it on the bottom of your deck.

cards.name: Yokai
cards.cardText: TIME TO UPGRADE Whenever this character quests, you may return one of your items to your hand to pay 2 {I} less for the next item you play this turn.

cards.name: Pleakley
cards.cardText:
REPORTING FOR DUTY When you play this character, put chosen character of yours into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

"As the duly appointed representative for the Galactic Council, I volunteer for this assignment!"

cards.name: Hiro Hamada
cards.cardText:
SWEET TECH {2} {E} - Search your deck for an item card or a Robot character card and reveal it to all players. Shuffle your deck and put that card on top of it.

"A couple more tweaks and I've just about... got it!"

cards.name: Heihei
cards.cardText:
EAT ANYTHING When you play this character, exert chosen opposing item. It can't ready at the start of its next turn.
OUT TO LUNCH During your turn, this character gains Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)

cards.name: Sour Bill
cards.cardText:
UNPALATABLE When you play this character, chosen opposing character gets -2 {S} this turn.

"You want to go in there? Fine. If you do, you won't come back out."

cards.name: Nick Wilde
cards.cardText:
NICE TO HAVE A PARTNER While you have another character with Support in play, this character gets +2 {S}.

"Glad you could make it."

cards.name: Wasabi
cards.cardText:
BLADES OF FURY When you play this character, you may banish chosen item. Its player gains 1 lore.
QUICK REFLEXES During your turn, this character gains Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)

cards.name: Nick Wilde
cards.cardText:
Shift 1 (You may pay 1 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Nick Wilde.)
CAN'T TOUCH ME While you have an item in play, this character can't be challenged.

cards.name: Gadget Hackwrench
cards.cardText: "All the clues pointed to an island, but I never thought I'd see it on a map. Golly, this is incredible! I mean, the island actually exists, so it's technically credible—but still! This is amazing!"

cards.name: Dr. Delbert Doppler
cards.cardText: "Of course! It all makes perfect sense. That's why my old star charts are useless. Every star in the sky here is different!"

cards.name: Tadashi Hamada
cards.cardText:
LET'S GET BACK TO WORK This character gets +1 {S} and +1 {W} for each item you have in play.

"I'm not giving up on you. You don't understand this yet, but people need you."

cards.name: Hiro Hamada
cards.cardText:
I NEED TO UPGRADE ALL OF YOU Your other Inventor characters gain Resist +1. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)

SHAPE THE FUTURE 2 {I} - Look at the top card of your deck. Put it on either the top or the bottom of your deck.

cards.name: Tadashi Hamada
cards.cardText:
SOMEONE HAS TO HELP During an opponent’s turn, when this character is banished, you may put the top card of your deck into your inkwell facedown. Then, put this card into your inkwell facedown.

His work lives on.

cards.name: Baymax
cards.cardText:
FULLY CHARGED If you have an Inventor character in play, you pay 1 {I} less to play this character.
YOU SAID 'OW' 2 {I} - Remove up to 1 damage from another chosen character.

cards.name: Baymax
cards.cardText: THE TREATMENT IS WORKING When you play this character and whenever he quests, you may remove up to 2 damage from another chosen character of yours. Gain 1 lore for each 1 damage removed this way.

cards.name: Yokai
cards.cardText: "You are all brilliant scientists and inventors. Think of what we could do with this little device. How do we push the boundaries of what is possible?"

cards.name: Hiram Flaversham
cards.cardText: He'll find a way to make anything mouse-sized.

cards.name: Yokai
cards.cardText:
Shift 6 (You may pay 6 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Yokai.)
NEUROTRANSMITTER You may play items named Microbots for free.
TECHNICAL GAIN Whenever this character quests, draw a card for each opposing character with {S}.

cards.name: Alice
cards.cardText:
Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)
AHOY! Whenever this character quests, another chosen character of yours gets +1 {L} and gains Ward until the start of your next turn.

cards.name: We Could Be Immortals
cards.cardText:
(A character with cost 4 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Your Inventor characters gain Resist +6 this turn. Then, put this card into your inkwell facedown and exerted. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 6.)

cards.name: Sail the Azurite Sea
cards.cardText:
This turn, you may put an additional card from your hand into your inkwell facedown. Draw a card.

You need a good plan and even better luck to make it across these treacherous waters.

cards.name: Helping Hand
cards.cardText:
Chosen character gains Support this turn. Draw a card. (Whenever they quest, you may add their {S} to another chosen character's {S} this turn.)

"When you're making the world a better place, every little thing helps."
—Judy Hopps

cards.name: Prepare Your Bot
cards.cardText:
Choose one:
* Ready chosen item.
* Ready chosen Robot character. They can't quest for the rest of this turn.

cards.name: Baymax's Healthcare Chip
cards.cardText:
10,000 MEDICAL PROCEDURES {E} - Choose one:
* Remove up to 1 damage from chosen character. 
* If you have a Robot character in play, remove up to 3 damage from chosen character.

cards.name: Microbots
cards.cardText:
LIMITLESS APPLICATIONS You may have any number of cards named Microbots in your deck.
INSPIRED TECH When you play this item, chosen character gets -1 {S} this turn for each item named Microbots you have in play.

cards.name: Jumbo Pop
cards.cardText: HERE YOU GO Banish this item – Remove up to 2 damage from each of your characters. Draw a card.

cards.name: Rescue Rangers Submarine
cards.cardText: PLANNING SESSION At the start of your turn, if you have a character here, you may put the top card of your deck into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

cards.name: Institute of Technology
cards.cardText:
WELCOME TO THE LAB Inventor characters get +1 {W} while here.
PUSH THE BOUNDARIES At the start of your turn, if you have a character here, gain 1 lore.

cards.name: Kakamora
cards.cardText:
A LITTLE HELP When you play this character, if you have another Pirate character in play, you may deal 1 damage to chosen character or location.

"They're very good at making trouble."
—Maui

cards.name: Kakamora
cards.cardText: COCONUT LEADER Whenever this character quests, you may draw a card. Then, choose and discard a card to deal 1 damage to chosen character or location. If a Pirate character card was discarded, deal 3 damage to that character or location instead.

cards.name: Jim Hawkins
cards.cardText: COME HERE, COME HERE, COME HERE! During your turn, whenever a card is put into your inkwell, this character gets Challenger +2 this turn. (While challenging, this character gets +2 {S}.)

cards.name: Mr. Big
cards.cardText:
REPUTATION This character can't be challenged by characters with 2 {S} or more.

"You've done me a great service."

cards.name: Mr. Smee
cards.cardText:
GOOD CATCH During your turn, this character gains Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)

"Captain Hook'd like a word with ya."

cards.name: Mr. Smee
cards.cardText:
Shift 4 (You may pay 4 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Mr. Smee.)
RAISE THE COLORS When you play this character, you may deal damage to chosen character equal to the number of your other Pirate characters in play.

cards.name: Mullins
cards.cardText:
FALL IN LINE While you have a character named Mr. Smee in play, this character gains Resist +1. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)

"Anything for you, Mr. Smee! Except me share o' the plunder..."

cards.name: Kohut
cards.cardText: "Ma'am! I am a highly trained instrument of tactical superiority! Maybe we could find someone else for the gruntwork! Ma'am!"

cards.name: King Hubert
cards.cardText: "I told you we'd find an island eventually! Excellent navigating. Yes, yes, I'm quite proud. Now, a toast to our success!"

cards.name: Hercules
cards.cardText:
Challenger +2 (While challenging, this character gets +2 {S}).

"That maze wasn't so bad! Let's see what this island has in store for us."

cards.name: John Silver
cards.cardText:
HUNK OF HARDWARE When you play this character, chosen character can't challenge during their next turn.

"At the end of the day, it's the simplest tools that come through for you in a pinch."

cards.name: Mr. Arrow
cards.cardText:
Resist +1 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1.)

"We're holding steady, Captain. Despite this wind. And these waves."

cards.name: Jim Hawkins
cards.cardText:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Jim Hawkins.)
BATTLE STATION When you play this character, you may deal 1 damage to chosen character or location.

cards.name: Tuk Tuk
cards.cardText:
Raya: "Nothing gets past Tuk Tuk. Nothing."
Sisu: "Except butterflies! Oh, and birds!"
Raya: "Fine. Most things don't get past Tuk Tuk."

cards.name: Billy Bones
cards.cardText:
KEEP IT HIDDEN When this character is banished, you may banish chosen item or location.

"He'll be comin' soon. Can't let them find this."

cards.name: Pluto
cards.cardText:
Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)
BRAVO While this character has no damage, he gets +4 {S}.

cards.name: Mickey Mouse
cards.cardText:
SUPPORT Your Pluto characters get Resist +1. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)

"Gee, Donald was right—it's spooky out here in the dark!"

cards.name: Cobra Bubbles
cards.cardText:
Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)
THINK ABOUT WHAT'S BEST 2 {I} – Draw a card, then choose and discard a card.

cards.name: Gantu
cards.cardText: "Strength in numbers is overrated. I prefer my own strength."

cards.name: Wreck-It Ralph
cards.cardText:
I WRECK THINGS Whenever this character quests, you may banish chosen item or location to gain 2 lore.

"I'm very good at what I do. Probably the best I know."

cards.name: Calhoun
cards.cardText:
Resist +1 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1.)
LEVEL UP During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, gain 2 lore.

cards.name: Captain Amelia
cards.cardText:
DRIVELING GALOOTS This character can't be challenged by Pirate characters.
EVERYTHING SHIPSHAPE While being challenged, your other characters gain Resist +1. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)

cards.name: Jafar
cards.cardText:
YOU WILL BE PAID WHEN THE TIME COMES During your turn, whenever a card is put into your inkwell, deal 1 damage to chosen character.

"The broken crown's power is formidable, but not enough. With both halves of the Hexwell Crown, I could rule all of Lorcana!"

cards.name: John Silver
cards.cardText:
Shift 5 (You may pay 5 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named John Silver.)
Resist +2 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 2.)
DON'T JUST SIT THERE! At the start of your turn, deal 1 damage to each opposing ready character.

cards.name: Hot Potato
cards.cardText:
Choose one:
- Deal 2 damage to chosen character.
- Banish chosen item.

"This is not going to end well."
—Pleakley

cards.name: I'm Still Here
cards.cardText:
(A character with cost 3 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Chosen character gains Resist +2 until the start of your next turn. Draw a card. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 2.)

cards.name: Twin Fire
cards.cardText:
Deal 2 damage to chosen character. Then, you may choose and discard a card to deal 2 damage to another chosen character.

"I got 'em!"
"No, I got 'em!"

cards.name: Ambush!
cards.cardText:
{E} one of your characters to deal damage equal to their {S} to chosen character.

Pirates will use any advantage they can get.

cards.name: Unfortunate Situation
cards.cardText: Each opponent chooses one of their characters and deals 4 damage to them.

cards.name: King's Sensor Core
cards.cardText:
SYMBOL OF ROYALTY Your Prince and King characters gain Resist +1. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)
ROYAL SEARCH {E}, 2 {I} – Reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a Prince or King character card, you may put that card into your hand. Otherwise, put it on the top of your deck.

cards.name: Training Dummy
cards.cardText: HANDLE WITH CARE {E}, 2 {I} – Chosen character gains Bodyguard until the start of your next turn. (An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

cards.name: Sunglasses
cards.cardText:
SPYCRAFT {E} - Draw a card, then choose and discard a card.

The coolest accessory for top agents.

cards.name: Treasure Mountain
cards.cardText: SECRET WEAPON At the start of your turn, deal damage to chosen character or location equal to the number of characters here.

cards.name: Galactic Council Chamber
cards.cardText: FEDERATION DECREE While you have an Alien or Robot character here, this location can’t be challenged.

cards.name: Chip 'n' Dale
cards.cardText:
Shift 5 (You may pay 5 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Chip or Dale.)
(This character counts as being named both Chip and Dale.)
SEARCH AND RESCUE During your turn, whenever a card is put into your inkwell, you may return a character card from your discard to your hand.

cards.name: Tiana
cards.cardText: SPECIAL RESERVATION Whenever a character of yours is challenged while this character is exerted, the challenging character gets -3 {S} this turn unless their player pays 3 {I}.

cards.name: Sugar Rush Speedway
cards.cardText: BRING IT HOME, LITTLE ONE! When you move a character here from another location, you may banish this location to gain 3 lore and draw 3 cards.

cards.name: Rafiki
cards.cardText:
Shift 7 (You may pay 7 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Rafiki.)
ASTRAL ATTUNEMENT During your turn, whenever a card is put into your inkwell, you may draw a card.

cards.name: Yzma
cards.cardText: FEEL THE POWER {E} - If you have fewer than 3 cards in your hand, draw until you have 3 cards in your hand.

cards.name: Maleficent's Staff
cards.cardText: BACK, FOOLS! Whenever one of your opponents’ characters, items, or locations is returned to their hand from play, gain 1 lore.

cards.name: Daisy Duck
cards.cardText: DISTANT SHORES Whenever one of your Pirate characters quests while at a location, draw a card.

cards.name: Basil
cards.cardText:
Shift 4 (You may pay 4 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Basil.)
TWISTS AND TURNS During your turn, whenever a card is put into your inkwell, you may pay 1 {I} to have chosen opponent choose and discard a card.

cards.name: You Came Back
cards.cardText: Ready chosen character.

cards.name: Raya
cards.cardText: COME ON, LET'S DO THIS Once during your turn, whenever a card is put into your inkwell, you may ready another chosen character of yours. They can't quest for the rest of this turn.

cards.name: Tigger
cards.cardText:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
SWASH YOUR BUCKLES Whenever you play an action, this character gets +1 {S} and +1 {L} this turn.

cards.name: The Islands I Pulled From the Sea
cards.cardText:
(A character with cost 3 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Search your deck for a location card, reveal that card to all players, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Gadget Hackwrench
cards.cardText:
Shift 4 (You may pay 4 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Gadget Hackwrench.)
MECHANICALLY SAVVY While you have 3 or more items in play, you pay 1 {I} less to play Inventor characters.

cards.name: Baymax
cards.cardText:
FULLY CHARGED If you have an Inventor character in play, you pay 1 {I} less to play this character.
YOU SAID 'OW' 2 {I} – Remove up to 1 damage from another chosen character.

cards.name: We Could Be Immortals
cards.cardText:
(A character with cost 4 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Your Inventor characters gain Resist +6 this turn. Then, put this card into your inkwell facedown and exerted. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 6.)

cards.name: Wreck-It Ralph
cards.cardText: I WRECK THINGS Whenever this character quests, you may banish chosen item or location to gain 2 lore.

cards.name: Captain Amelia
cards.cardText:
DRIVELING GALOOTS This character can’t be challenged by Pirate characters.
EVERYTHING SHIPSHAPE While being challenged, your other characters gain Resist +1. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)

cards.name: Treasure Mountain
cards.cardText: SECRET WEAPON At the start of your turn, deal damage to chosen character or location equal to the number of characters here.
